definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Logistics is a branch of military science.
sentences.chinese: 後勤是軍事科學的一個分支。

sentences.english: His minor subjects included philosophy and military science.
He also taught military science at West Virginia University.
sentences.chinese: 他還在西弗吉尼亞大學教軍事科學的課程。

sentences.english: Current directions in military science place great importance on defense networks.
sentences.chinese: 現代軍事科學的趨勢是注重防衛系統。

sentences.english: He worked indefatigably to train cadres in modern military science.
sentences.chinese: 爲造就具有現代軍事科學知識的幹部，伯承嘔心瀝血。

sentences.english: He has also taught military science at West Virginia University.
sentences.chinese: 他還在西弗吉尼亞大學教軍事科學的課程。

sentences.english: The stealth technology is one of the most important achievements in modern military science.
sentences.chinese: 隱身技術是當代軍事科學的重要成就之一。
